checkUpKeep(bytes).details: This is the function that the Chainlink Automation nodes call to see if it's time to perform an upkeep. The following should be true for this to return true: 1. The time interval has passed between raffle time 2. The raffle is the OPEN state 3. The contract has ETH (aka, players) 4. (Implicit) The subscription is funded with LINK token

documentation.text:
@dev This is the function that the Chainlink Automation nodes call to see if it's time to perform an upkeep.
 The following should be true for this to return true:
 1. The time interval has passed between raffle time
 2. The raffle is the OPEN state
 3. The contract has ETH (aka, players)
 4. (Implicit) The subscription is funded with LINK token
